title: Monitor for Regulatory Intelligence Updates
description: A regulatory intelligence specialist must monitor global health authority websites for new draft guidances that could impact the company's products.

tasks.description: Scan the websites of the FDA, EMA, and PMDA for new documents published in the last 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully scrapes the websites for new publications.

tasks.description: Filter the results for keywords relevant to the company's therapeutic areas (e.g., 'oncology', 'gene therapy').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent filters the list and identifies a new draft guidance on gene therapy from the FDA.

tasks.description: Perform an initial impact assessment of the new draft guidance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary of the guidance and notes that it will affect one of the company's pipeline products.

tasks.description: Distribute an alert with the summary and a link to the guidance document to the relevant internal teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a notification to the gene therapy development team.
